[[Center(begin)]]
== ''' Terminology ''' ==
[[Center(end)]]
 * Council: Hirlam-A Council, formed by directors of HIRLAM-member institutes and observers from ALADIN consortia
 * HAC: Hirlam-A Advisory committee, formed by head of research or university professors at member countries, + observers representing ALADIN consortium and UK Metoffice
 * Management Group: Hirlam-A program manager and project leaders
 * Staff: Researchers who participating in the HIRLAM-A programme as seen in the HIRLAM-A workplan
 * Associated: Researchers who in-directly participate in HIRLAM-A programme but normally do their research & application at member services.
